facts-h2-subtitle: Interesting facts about this APP and me
facts-modal: This page shows facts about this APP and me. In addition, it offers space for small gimmicks that I have built into this page.
facts-hero-quote: Hello my name is D. Goergens and I am the builder of this app. To the left of this text you see a random image. I have no influence on this picture and every now and then it doesn't quite fit. This site is one of my projects, I hope you will be entertained and find something that might fascinate or amaze you. I wanted to thank NASA again for providing these fantastic APIs. With the help of the fantastic data I got from this, I was able to let my creativity run free and create all of this.
facts-banner-title-wide: Enough about me! On to the action!
